originalText.text: I have been working with Sarah Roberts and Team SGR at Glocap and I cannot tell you how HAPPY I am with them and how grateful to be working with such an amazing team of individuals! I have worked with several recruitment firms in the past and the team at Glocap has been the first (and only) I can say with confidence have made me feel cared for since day one. They truly want the best for you and are always looking for roles for you! From the amount of detail they provide, to the effective communication all across (email and phone calls), extremely personable and encouraging, every step of the way they are cheering you on! I highly recommend their services to anyone looking for employment.

originalText.text: I’d like to recommend Glocap as a premiere recruitment firm, particularly for an investments professional role. Shortly after graduation, I worked with 5+ recruiters but ultimately ended up at a position that Glocap helped me secure. Tara Cohen was a pleasure to work with, handling the entire process in a professional and timely manner. She provided a comprehensive explanation of not only the role itself, but also the history/background of the firm, its business strategy, and the overall firm culture. I found this to be unique among the other recruiters I’ve worked with, and always felt prepared through my entire interview process. Overall, I believe that my positive experience can be attributed to the attention to detail, follow up, and constant feedback/guidance.

originalText.text: Chantal and Laura were professional and fast and really listened to me and helped me find a path in my new career. I will always turn to Glocap for my professional needs in the future. I met with probably 10 recruiters and Glocap was the most consistent and always followed up. Their daily job postings give you the power to apply to any job you think you will be a good fit for. Thanks a million!!

originalText.text: Glocap definitely sets itself apart from other employment agencies and it can be seen immediately upon meeting with them! They helped me find an incredible job that really matched well with what I was looking for, along with my personality. Other employment agencies I worked with in the past were never as accommodating or personable, and they definitely never made me feel as cared for as Glocap did! I highly recommend their services to anyone looking for employment.

originalText.text: Colette is brilliant.  She made an enthusiastic recommendation for a smart temp whom we hired full-time and are very pleased with the hire.  She takes the time to get to know people and thoughtfully place them in productive roles for all.
